id.story: Owns a secret Black Jade mine under her family's more modest "Wayne Manor". Someone has developed an anti-psychotic drug using Black and Green Jade that has helped her schizophrenic younger sister. Owns and operates a drug den in Kausao City. Relationship w/Jianghu (江湖; lit. "rivers and lakes") is unclear. Probably travels in upper crust social circles, and employs Stephen Gilios as a networking toadie / club manager. The mining company owned by her family is smaller than any of the big 5 from pg96.
